column4: hi all, just installed ubuntu hardy.  Under hardware drivers it lists nvidia-new has the enabled checked but then says not in use.  How do I get it to use it?

I have an ATi card.. but what worked for me, installing the driver using Synaptics, then disabling and enabling the driver again
